thread.title: UNLV football players paint Fremont Cannon red — VIDEO
thread.title_full: UNLV football players paint Fremont Cannon red — VIDEO | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Mark Anderson
title: UNLV football players paint Fremont Cannon red — VIDEO
text:
About 1,500 students and officials showed up at the UNLV Student Union this morning to watch the football team paint the Fremont Cannon red.
The Rebels captured the cannon with Saturday's 23-17 victory at UNR .
"This is for Vegas," quarterback Blake Decker told the crowd. "This is for UNLV. Don't get used to seeing this blue because it's going to be red for a long time."
Check back later for an updated version of this story.
2 Rebels named Mountain... Paint it red! Fremont...
